translations: 谦逊地，谦虚地；简朴地，低廉地；羞怯地，腼腆地；在很小的程度上

sentences.sentence: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat.
sentences.translation: 他们谦虚地谈论了他们为让油轮保持不沉而付出的英勇努力。

sentences.sentence: "You really must be very good at what you do."—"I suppose I am," Kate said modestly.
sentences.translation: “你确实非常擅长你所做的。” —“我觉得是吧。”凯特谦虚地说。

sentences.sentence: "I understand but one," replied the cat, modestly.
sentences.translation: “我只会一门本领，”猫谦虚地回答。
